definition: tool/device/utensil/equipment/instrument/talent/ability/to possess/to have/to provide/to furnish/to state/classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies

sentences.english: Some of Pedini collections includes nice re-invent of inline kitchen layouts.
sentences.chinese: 一些佩蒂尼的产品包含了重新发明的内嵌厨具布局。

sentences.english: A technology of surface chemical coloring of stainless steel for cooking utensil is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了一种厨具用不锈钢的表面化学著色工艺。

sentences.english: Description: A sturdy, man-made backpack carrying a fine selection of cookware and spices.
sentences.chinese: 一个装有优质厨具和调味料的结实的人类制造的背包。

sentences.english: Washing the dishware with water after cleaning.
sentences.chinese: 清洁厨具后，用水冲洗餐具即可。

sentences.english: We are manufacturer of thousand kinds of wood tableware and kitchenware in Thailand .
sentences.chinese: 我们是泰国万余种木制餐具和厨具的制造商。

sentences.english: Well, we hope to sell 500 in 12 months.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望12个月内卖出500套厨具。

sentences.english: The design of popularity of international kitchen utensils and appliances this year is the linear and orthogonal type of concise palpability .
sentences.chinese: 今年的国际厨具流行款式是简洁明了的直线直角式。

sentences.english: The George Forman Grill became the best selling electric appliance in history.
sentences.chinese: 拳王智烤炉成为有史以来最销量最好的电动厨具。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to an intelligent supersonic kitchen ware sterilizing cabinet, which is composed of a cabinet body and a control panel.
sentences.chinese: 智能型超声波厨具消毒柜，由柜体和控制面板构成。

sentences.english: By this time there were clear sounds of kitchen crockery and utensils moving around.
sentences.chinese: 此时，我听到了厨房厨具和陶罐移动的声音。

sentences.english: Toilets and cooking facilities are shared with the other residents of this underground home.
sentences.chinese: 洗手间和厨具是和地下其他的家庭一起公用的。

definition: cupboard/cupboard that can also be used as a table/sideboard
portable gas stove (fueled by a gas cartridge)
